notes.title: What is Flutter?
notes.content: Flutter is an open-source UI framework for creating native mobile applications. It allows developers to build mobile applications a single codebase.

notes.title: Stateful Widgets
notes.content: The widgets whose state can be altered once they are built are called stateful Widgets.

notes.title: Conditional (ternary) operator
notes.content: The conditional (ternary) operator in Dart takes three operands: a condition, first expression (if truthy) and second expression (if falsy).
